title: How to find the meaning of my life - Quora

response.answer_text: In psychology, they say meaning can only be achieved when two things happen Personal growthContribution to othersI say, you specifically can only find meaning when you get to know who you truly are, discover your purpose, discover and develop your potential, know and follow the right principles, and be aligned to the right environment, then you will live a purpose-driven life of service to others. Why the discovery of oneself is important  How to live a purpose-driven life of service. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DhbE5BzPBgU&t=62s
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Hakan Fatih Büyükadali
